tool_description: Assembles final RFP documents by combining templates, requirements, terms, and all components into publication-ready format.
error_messages: Missing component references: All required ID parameters must be provided.
Invalid component ID: One or more component IDs are not found.
Missing contact information: Procurement officer contacts are required.
Contract terms missing: Final contract terms must be included.
Invalid formatting style: Choose standard, formal, or accessible formatting.
usage: Provide all component IDs from previous tools, final contract terms, and contact information. Optionally include attachments and specify formatting. The tool produces a complete RFP document ready for distribution.

rfp_document_id.description: Unique identifier for the assembled RFP document

document_sections.description: List of document sections in final RFP

document_status.description: Assembly status and readiness for distribution

page_count.description: Total number of pages in assembled document
